Source.Name: akonadi-mime
Source.Summary: Akonadi Mime is a library that effectively bridges the type-agnostic API of the Akonadi client libraries and the domain-specific KMime library.
Source.Description: Akonadi Mime is a library that effectively bridges the type-agnostic API of the Akonadi client libraries and the domain-specific KMime library. It provides jobs, models and other helpers to make working with emails through Akonadi easier.

Package.Name: akonadi-mime
Package.Summary: Akonadi Mime is a library that effectively bridges the type-agnostic API of the Akonadi client libraries and the domain-specific KMime library.
Package.Description: Akonadi Mime is a library that effectively bridges the type-agnostic API of the Akonadi client libraries and the domain-specific KMime library. It provides jobs, models and other helpers to make working with emails through Akonadi easier.
